name: Infinity Quest
description:
you wake up in a nice cosy house that is near a long river but all you remember is your name. you must embark on an epic quest either by yourself or with your friends.

Infinity Quest is a game that I made in the year 2018 going into 2019 but I was a bit younger at the time so it was very messy and I'm glad to say that has changed. at the time I first made this game I had never played any other role-playing game other than one that I played for about 20 minutes with my cousin but other than that I just used my imagination. (sorry if that sounds tacky) Finally, I have made a neat and playable version of this game and I wanted to release it to the world if I get enough support I want to make expansions, boxed sets and maybe even spin-off games so grab your sword and some dice and I hope you have a good quest.

PS: i tried to make the monsters look as similar as the original so they might look a bit weird
